content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to improve the code with suggestions from my computer. The command returned an updated code that imports requests and BeautifulSoup, and defines a function to find the best ways to learn a language in a destination. The code also includes a dictionary of destinations for different languages and a block of code to print the best ways to learn each language in each destination. As the user, I sent a command to execute the updated Python file.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_python_file returned: Error: File '/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/best_ways_to_learn.py' does not exist."}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/best_ways_to_learn.py", "text": "import requests\\nfrom bs4 import BeautifulSoup\\n\\ndestinations = {\\n    \'Indonesian\': [\'Salatiga, Java, Indonesia\'],\\n    \'European Portuguese\': [\'Lisbon, Portugal\'],\\n    \'Brazilian Portuguese\': [\'Maceio, Brazil\', \'Fortaleza, Brazil\'],\\n    \'Spanish\': [\'Madrid, Spain\', \'Medellin, Colombia\', \'Sucre, Bolivia\'],\\n    \'Castellano Spanish\': [\'Zaragoza, Spain\']\\n}\\n\\n\\ndef get_best_ways_to_learn(language, destination):\\n    query = f\'best ways to learn {language} in {destination}\'\\n    google_url = f\'https://www.google.com/search?q={query}\'\\n    response = requests.get(google_url)\\n    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, \'html.parser\')\\n    return soup.find_all(\'div\', class_=\'BNeawe iBp4i AP7Wnd\')\\n\\nif __name__ == \'__main__\':\\n    for language in destinations:\\n        print(f\'Best ways to learn {language}:\')\\n        if language in destinations:\\n            for destination in destinations[language]:\\n                results = get_best_ways_to_learn(language, destination)\\n                if results:\\n                    print(f\'{destination}: {results[0].text}\')\\n        print(\'\\\\n\')\\n"}}}'}]
"""
